Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.gamestates

Class AbstractGameState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.gamestates.AbstractGameState
Direct Known Subclasses:
EndGame, OngoingGame, PreGodsGame, PreInitGame, PreWorkersGame
public abstract class AbstractGameState
extends java.lang.Object
An abstract class that can be implemented by the states. It contains variables and methods that are common to all the implemented states.

    abstract Player getCurrentPlayer()
    Obtain the current player that is able to interact with the game Calling this method repeatedly should not result in a different player unless other methods got called If the game has ended, this method must return the winner

    • logout

      public boolean logout​(java.lang.String player)
      Handles the player disconnection If the player is a spectator, logging out should have no effect If the player is still in-game, the game is ended
      Parameters:
      player - The disconnected player
      Returns:
      true if the game has to be ended
